definitions.text: the act of engaging in close hand-to-hand combat
examples: we watched his grappling and wrestling with the bully

definitions.text: combat to overcome an opposing tendency or force
examples: He wrestled all his life with his feeling of inferiority

definitions.text: engage in deep thought, consideration, or debate
examples: I wrestled with this decision for years

definitions.text: to move in a twisting or contorted motion, (especially when struggling)
examples: The child tried to wriggle free from his aunt's embrace
The children wrestled in the garden
